sst2.description: The dataset consists of movie reviews with binary sentiment annotations. The task is to classify each movie review as either positive or negative.

cr.description: The dataset contains customer reviews of various products with sentiment annotations. The task is to classify each review as expressing either positive or negative sentiment.

mr.description: The dataset includes movie reviews with binary sentiment annotations. The task is to classify the sentiment of each review as either positive or negative.

sst-5.description: The dataset consists of movie reviews with five levels of sentiment labels: terrible, bad, neutral, okay, good, and great. The task is to classify each movie review into one of these five sentiment categories.

agnews.description: The dataset contains news articles categorized into four classes: World, Sports, Business, and Tech. The task is to classify each news article into one of the four categories.

trec.description: The dataset includes questions categorized into different types: Description, Entity, Expression, Human, Location, and Number. The task is to classify each question into one of these six question types.

subj.description: The dataset contains sentences labeled as either subjective or objective. The task is to classify each sentence as either subjective or objective.
